ActPublic Service Rearrangement and Transfer of Duties Act
PrecisTransfer (a) from the Department of Canadian Heritage to the PARKS CANADA AGENCY of the control and supervision of the HISTORIC PLACES POLICY GROUP; and (b) to the MINISTER OF THE ENVIRONMENT of certain powers, duties and functions of the Minister of Canadian Heritage under the Department of Canadian Heritage Act related to the design and implementation of programs that have built heritage as their primary subject-matter; effective July 20, 2004.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2004-0112 Publication Date: 2004-08-11
